GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, in descending order of date created

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the article matching the given id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments within a given article_id

comments.article_title: They're not exactly dogs, are they?
comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment under a specific article id, then responds with the added comment

comment.article_title: They're not exactly dogs, are they?
comment.body: I'm suing Mitch for his heinous encouragement of trading illegal bacon stocks on Club Penguin
comment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes of the given article_id, then responds with the updated article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment based on the given article_id and responds with no content
